description:
These road brake shoes provides good braking in wet conditions, and work best with alloy rims.

  • Non-cartridge style shoes fit: BR-1055, BR-A550, BR-A416, BR-A410, BR-4400, BR-3300
  • Compound performs well in wet conditions, but the trade-off is faster rim wear
  • Length is 50mm
name: Shimano M50T Road Brake Shoes
